OsclTickCount Class Reference
[OSCL Util]

#include <oscl_tickcount.h>

Static Public Member Functions

static uint32 TickCount ()
static uint32 TickCountFrequency ()
static uint32 TickCountPeriod ()
static uint32 TicksToMsec (uint32 ticks)
static uint32 MsecToTicks (uint32 msec)

Detailed Description

OsclTickCount class is used to retrieve the system tick count and the tick counter's frequency.

The maximum tick count value is equivalent to the maximum uint32 value.

Member Function Documentation
